title: SKT T1 gets the royal treatment compared with other teams?
body:
What is the deal here?

SKT seem to get the royal treatment compared with everyone else. They are the only team to ever get a ward skin with their championship team skins. _(even the teams afterwards didn't get a ward.)_
And then when they get new skins for winning again, Riot makes them, then completely re-does them all to a standard thats way higher than any other championship team skins just because some of the community wanted them to, (yet they don't listen to the community in regards to improving other skins like Bloodmoon Yasuo before release). Not only that, but instead of the usual 5, they made 7 skins _(admittedly though one of which is not being released)_, but thats still an extra skin, also all the skins get new particles and recalls, unlike all the other team skins _(with the exception of SSW Talon, where he has mildly different blades)_ 

--------

So whats the deal? Yea SKT are crowd favourites, but should that entitle them to better rewards? 
Its kinda stink for the other teams, who gave it their all as well. 

Also it was really really stink for Sivir mains: 
_"Heres a cool skin for you guys.... **PSYCHE!** hahaha omg! You should have seen your face Sivir!"_

PS. Not that I'm complaining about the new skins, they look awesome and I'm a huge fan of improvement and progress, I just cant help but think it is kinda a little stink for everyone else.
